text: Jerry M. Reinsdorf (born February 25, 1936) is an American lawyer and an owner of the NBA's Chicago Bulls and the MLB's Chicago White Sox. He started his professional life as a tax attorney with the Internal Revenue Service. He has been the head of the White Sox and Bulls for over 25 years. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Chicago Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Businesspeople from Chicago
title: Jerry Reinsdorf
